body_html:
There are surprisingly not many links in the code pointing to the get_started/ material (maybe because this directory was added later).
The ones that I found use the full URL, which our redirects will catch. We should still update those files, but I'll wait until after this all settles.

I've been building the docs regularly and staging. The doc generator did catch a few instances of broken ${} links, but they were all in docs_src/
